`bigwrig` provides read access to bigWig files in R using `libBigWig` from @dpryan79. Data is read into an R `data_frame`.

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(bigwrig)

url <- ''

read_bigwig(url)

read_bigwig_genome(url)
```
